actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to exempt small independent oil products from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Exempts small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973. Defines "small independent oil producer "as any person who owns five thousand or fewer barrels per day of domestic oil production; and who refines not more than thirty thousand barrels per day of petroleum products.

titles.title: A bill to exempt small independent oil products from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.
